p: Importantly, M pro protein of SARS-CoV-2 and SARS-CoV have a high degree of homology in three domains ( Figure 2B) (1) domain I (residues 8 to 101), (2) domain II (residues 102 to 184) comprises of two-β-barrel fold similar to that of the chymotrypsin-type serine peptidases and, (3) domain III (residues 201 to 300) has five α-helices and is connected to domain II by a long loop (residues 185 to 200) (Jin et al., 2020).
